image-reference.title: Construction of walls to reduce impact sound and achieve a 50 RW: timber-framed walling (method 2)

image.alt: Construction of walls to reduce impact sound and achieve a 50 RW: timber-framed walling (method 2)

desc-note.p: 70 mm x 45 mm F5 timber double studs at 450 mm - 600 mm centres with an air space not less than 20 mm between studs with two layers of 13 mm fire-protective grade plasterboard on both faces.
